name: Police Robot War Car Games 3D
description:
Police robot car Battle features:

- Flying police robot rescue missions.
- Police robot car transformation.
- Special Robot Car shooting skills.
- 50+ missions
- 20+ Weapons to choose
- Realistic city battleground.

Play the new police robot car game and explore new robot gun shooting & exciting us police robot missions that make you enjoy with it each time you play it. fight for the civilians of the Miami city. As a robot superhero rescue innocent people from the evil robots that killing innocent people, kidnapping the kids and stealing people money. the police department unable to control robot gangsters anymore so it is now your duty to fight against them and send them to justice.
